alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 12 at 7:05PM PST until December 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM PST MONDAY... * CHANGES...None. * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Local gusts to 75 mph are possible along Highway 95 near Walker Lake. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds along Highway 95 will be particularly strong with impacts to high-profile vehicle travel.
info.instruction: Now is the time secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.
